name: Natural OilSilicone Elastomer Gel SiCare® 9938
description: Natural OilSilicone Elastomer Gel SiCare® 9938 is natural oil and natural oil modified siloxane which includes no annular silicone oil, but quite silky smooth with powdery texture. It is non-greasy, has a great spreadability and elasticity, can cover tiny wrinkles, with excellent moisture retention, softness and skin affinity, can offer perfect skin touch, and bring excellent skin care performance. With great compatibility and thickening ability, it can reduce formula viscosity, absorb sebum fast, meanwhile enhance moisturizing performance, spread-ability and skin affinity. It can reduce dryness for powdery products to keep fresh natural feel, and maintain make-up lasting and clean. When used in skin care products, it can bring soft and pleasure skin-touch, soften and moisten skin, keep products on skin surface for longer time. Used in sunscreen products, it can reduce greasy feel, and bring better using feel.
